rows.label: qev030201_MSG0001
rows.name: Hmm? You are not Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0002
rows.name: Who are you? Why are you here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_JNK0010
rows.name: Introduce

rows.label: qev030201_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you're a human.

rows.label: qev030201_JNK0020
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev030201_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Oll that you have come to rescue him.

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0003
rows.name: I see that. But why are you here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0004
rows.name: ...Chieftain sent you? I am grateful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0005
rows.name: ...Chieftain sent you? I knew he would help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0006
rows.name:
This cell's key is held by Cavern clansman called Ajiba
Falgo. Deal with him and take key.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0007
rows.name: I count on you. My brother needs help. I must get free.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0008
rows.name:
This cell's key is held by Cavern clansman called Ajiba
Falgo. Deal with him and take key.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0009
rows.name: You freed me. Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Now I can rescue Rada. I will free him even if it costs
my life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0011
rows.name: ...What? You rescued Rada?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0012
rows.name: Good. Then I must hurry back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0013
rows.name:
Thank you, [ST:playername ]. You have done
much for us. Soon Rada and I will eat meat again.
You must join us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0014
rows.name: ...What? You will help him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0015
rows.name:
...Yes. You are right. I was starved in captivity.
I have little strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0016
rows.name: I leave it to you. My brother is held in this base.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030201_MSG0017
rows.name: Get him out safe. Be victorious![ST:wait ]
